description: Break down useHealthQueries.ts (745 LOC) into smaller modules (max 300 LOC each)

workstreams.description: Analyze file structure and identify logical groupings
Create patient and appointment queries module
Create medical records and provider queries module
Create clinical data queries module (vitals, medications, allergies, labs)
Create alerts and analytics queries module

decisions.decision: Break file into 5 logical modules: patient/appointments (190 LOC), medical-records/providers/facilities (210 LOC), clinical-data (150 LOC), alerts/analytics (180 LOC), plus index

All modules created successfully with LOC well under 300: usePatientAppointmentQueries.ts (220 LOC), useMedicalRecordProviderQueries.ts (231 LOC), useClinicalDataQueries.ts (157 LOC), useAlertAnalyticsQueries.ts (167 LOC)
